name: Scoojio - The City Bird Hero by Flappy Fun Games
name_original: Scoojio - The City Bird Hero by Flappy Fun Games
description:
Scoojio - The City Bird Hero by Flappy Fun Games is an arcade game developed by Flappy Fun Games. It was originally released in 2014. It was published by Flappy Fun Games.
You can play Scoojio - The City Bird Hero by Flappy Fun Games on iOS.
